name: Malavision®: The Origin
description: A politician runs away upon sued corruption acts against him were proved. He gets in a private property located in the Paraguayan Chaco. As his assistant disappears, he decides to go into his quest. What is awaiting him to live has existed only in the imagination, myth and superstition.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64 bits Processor: AMD ATHLON II X 2 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or higher DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64 bits Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 4GB or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
